Mr. HARIDOPOLOS. Mr. Speaker, it is an honor to be here with you this  morning to talk about the good news. Every day, I hear in so many  newscasts that somehow the sky is falling. Let's get to the facts about  what is actually happening in our economy and, most importantly, how  America is moving in the right direction.
